  5. Sextantio Albergo Diffuso

# Sextantio Albergo Diffuso

Santo Stefano di Sessanio, Italy

Voir toutes les photos

Introduction

Created as a result of the proprietor’s love of the art and culture of this
mountainous area, Sextantio – Albergo Diffuso represents the first attempt at
completely restoring one of Abruzzo’s ancient villages for residential
purposes. With 29 rooms, the minimalist yet simple chic bedrooms are noted for
the finer details extended to the furnishings, using local craftwork tradition
and complimented by a touch of advanced technology.  
  
Don't miss :  
  
The extraordinary sunset, the wine cellar " Il Cantinone ", cours de
fabrication de pain ou fromage, randonnée, trekking.

## Our services

Pets allowed

Historical house

Environmentally responsible

Horse riding

Very quiet hotel

Internet

Wedding

Hikes

Conference room

Tennis

## Our prices

 **Room**|  from 220 to 350 EUR  
---|---  
 **Suite**|  from 450 to 450 EUR  
  
## Your advantages

  

 **\- 20% discount in low season.  
\- Breakfast offered for 2 during the stay.  
\- Fruit basket in the room upon arrival.  
\- A glass of champagne or a cocktail offered upon arrival.  
\- Afternoon tea and pastries offered.**

## Our closing periods

  

 **20/11-3/12 25/01-13/02**

About the place

Hotel in Santo Stefano di Sessanio : Sextantio Albergo Diffuso

You wish to stay in Santo Stefano di Sessanio, Abruzze ? Authentic Hotels &
Cruises has selected for you the best establishments. To this end, our teams
have carefully studied the quality of the welcome and services offered by the
hotels in Santo Stefano di Sessanio. Among them, Sextantio Albergo Diffuso is
one of our favorites. This hotel in Santo Stefano di Sessanio - which we have
rated as "Exceptional" - will charm you with its architecture, its landscape,
its decoration and its comfort. Authentic Hotel & Cruises strives to recommend
hotels in Santo Stefano di Sessanio that meet all your criteria. The Sextantio
Albergo Diffuso establishment is eco-responsible and also offers you a wide
range of services : horse riding, tennis,... You can book this hotel in Santo
Stefano di Sessanio directly on the Authentic Hotels & Cruises website.
Sextantio Albergo Diffuso will welcome you for an unforgettable stay.
